name: capstone-rick-and-morty
description: This is a simple search application built using Node.js, EJS (Embedded JavaScript templates), TailwindCSS Axios and Rick and Morty API. This project allows you to search with over 800+ indices of Rick and Morty characters, and search by name if it's the right name you'll get a random character from list of chars with the same name.
author: AMR
